participant_1.name: Jordan
participant_1.personality: Motivated and focused, always looking to improve and make the most out of life.
participant_1.background: Rap music is my thing. I plan to retire in 6 months. My favorite color is green. I try to do my job as best as I can. I have a very toned body.

participant_2.name: Avery
participant_2.personality: Determined and resilient, I always strive to overcome challenges and stay positive.
participant_2.background: I like to eat soft foods that are easy to digest when I am confined to my bed. My father used to be an insurance salesman. I wake early to watch the sun rise every day. I am taking courses online. I am an athlete.

content.text: What's up?
Not a lot just got back from a morning run
Nice! I like to run too. I am trying to get in shape for my retirement
Retirement? Wow how old are you?
Not that old, I am in my 40s but I am ready to relax and enjoy life
Good for you! I am an athlete so I can't wait to be able to play again
What sport do you play?
I am a gymnast and I have been injured so I am taking some time off
I hope you get better soon! I love to listen to rap music when I run
That's cool! I love to listen to music when I work out too
What's your favorite color?
Green is my favorite color
Me too! It's a very calming color
I agree! It's also the color of money
Haha! True! I like to make money so I can retire early
That's a good plan! I hope you reach your goal
Thanks! I appreciate it! What's your favorite thing about being an athlete?
I love the feeling of being in shape and being able to do things that other people can't
That's great! I wish I was more athletic
You can be! Just start working out and eating healthy
I know I need to start! Thank you for the encouragement!
You're welcome
